K12mahpratu:1180: upasaṃkramatāṃ ca teṣām ayaṃ mahāvidyārājā smartavyā /
K12mahpratu:1181: tatas te sarvaduṣṭacittā vidyādharasya vaśyā ājñāśravaṇavidheyā bhavanti /
K12mahpratu:1182: asyā evānubhāvena yad uta mahāpratisarāvidyārājñyā na cāsya śatrubhayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K12mahpratu:1183: anatikramaṇīyaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvaśatrugaṇai rājarājamahāmātyair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiś ca /
K12mahpratu:1184: antaśo 'pi ca vadhyārho vadhakapuruṣair ucchritāny api śastrāṇi khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ gacchanti pāṃsumayānīva viśīryante /
K12mahpratu:1187: [48] rakṣoghnaṃ paramaṃ hy etat pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam /
K12mahpratu:1191: strīpuṃsayoḥ parā rakṣā vidyeyaṃ hi mahābalā /
K12mahpratu:1194: patha utpatham āpanna etāṃ vidyām anusmaret // 4 //
K12mahpratu:1195: panthānaṃ labhate śīghraṃ bhojanaṃ pānam uttamam /
K12mahpratu:1196: kāyena manasā vācā yat kṛtaṃ pūrvajanmasu // 5 //
K12mahpratu:1197: aśubhaṃ bahuvidhaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ kṣapayiṣyati /
K12mahpratu:1198: smaraṇād dhāraṇāc caiva udgrahāl lekhanād api // 6 //
K12mahpratu:1201: evaṃ hi dharmarase prāpte pāpā gacchanti saṃkṣayam /
K12mahpratu:1202: sidhyante sarvakāryāṇi manasā yad yad īpsitam // 8 //
K12mahpratu:1204: rājāgnir udakaṃ caiva vidyud vā taskaro 'pi vā // 9 //
K12mahpratu:1206: te sarve pralayaṃ yānti vidyāyā lakṣajāpataḥ // 10 //
K12mahpratu:1209: sarveṣu caiva sthāneṣu imāṃ vidyāṃ prayojayet /
K12mahpratu:1211: sidhyanty ayatnatas tāni vidyāto nātra saṃśayaḥ /
K12mahpratu:1215: caturaḥ pūrṇakumbhāṃś ca sthāpayed vidhinā budhaḥ // 2 //
K12mahpratu:1216: puṣpāṇy avakiret tatra dhūpayed dhūpam uttamam /
K12mahpratu:1218: pūrvavad gandhapuṣpāṃś ca dadyāc cātra vidhānavit /
K12mahpratu:1219: catasras tīrikāḥ sthāpyāḥ sarvāś ca paṭṭabaddhikāḥ // 4 //
K12mahpratu:1223: saptaśo japtayā cāsya rakṣāṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ // 6 //
K12mahpratu:1226: bhūyaś ca sapta vārān vai balikumbhasumantritam /
K12mahpratu:1228: ity evaṃ dakṣiṇe pārśve kṣipeta sapta eva tu /
K12mahpratu:1229: paścimāyāṃ ca saptaiva uttarāyāṃ tathā diśi // 9 //
K12mahpratu:1230: adha ūrdhvaṃ tu saptaiva kṛtā rakṣā bhaviṣyati /
K12mahpratu:1233: nāsty asyāḥ parā kācid rakṣāvidyā tridhātuke // 11 //
K12mahpratu:1234: [50] na tasya mṛtyur na jarā na rogo
K12mahpratu:1246: [51] vajrapāṇiś ca yakṣendra indraś caiva śacīpatiḥ /
K12mahpratu:1249: te ca sarve mahānāgā devatā ṛṣayas tathā // 2 //
K12mahpratu:1250: asurā garuḍā gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś ca mahoragāḥ /
K12mahpratu:1252: likhitāṃ dhārayet prājño bāhau baddhvā maharddhikām /
K12mahpratu:1253: mahatīṃ labhate pūjāṃ saṃpadaṃ cāpi nityaśaḥ // 4 //
K12mahpratu:1254: [52] idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
